name: ChaosVSFlock
description:
You can move around using AWSD or the arrows, also use the mouse to look up or down. You can shoot with space (keep it pressed).

The butterflies have two types of movements. Chaotic movement (yellow) or and ordered flocking behaviour (blue). Your goal is to archive >90% of chaos (red). 

You can also just watch both simulations, go far from the center to see the whole picture.
